name: command-center
description: That first open tab in your browser is a gateway to a multitude of websites.  The paths to each of these websites are varied: some require navigating the bookmarks menu, others require typing enough text that the browser can autcomplete the address, and some you just have to search for.  Command Center is just a way to collect those websites into easily clickable links, streamlining the web surfing process.
author: nvb
